description: Fatal compilation error due to missing 'trio.h' header file. The build process fails because the required Trio library (trio.h) is not found or not installed in the system.

Implicit declaration errors for 'fseeko64' and 'lseek64', indicating missing feature macros for large file support (e.g., _LARGEFILE64_SOURCE). The build fails due to outdated function declarations or missing compiler flags.
Failed symbolic link creation due to existing files and implicit declaration of 'toupper' caused by missing <ctype.h> include. The build fails due to file conflicts and incomplete headers.
CMake configuration error: Project requires updating cmake_minimum_required to a compatible version (>=3.5). The build fails due to outdated CMake version constraints.
CMake configuration error: Compatibility with CMake <3.5 removed. Update cmake_minimum_required version in CMakeLists.txt to resolve the build failure.
CMake policy CMP0005 error: Project uses deprecated OLD policy behavior no longer supported. Update CMakeLists.txt to use NEW behavior for compatibility.
Build failure due to missing QT module 'dtkcore' and CMake feature 'dtk_cmake'. The project requires DTK framework dependencies or correct QT configuration.
CMake configuration error: Outdated cmake_minimum_required version. Update to use syntax compatible with CMake >=3.5 to fix the build.
CMake configuration error: Incompatible cmake_minimum_required version. Update to use a minimum CMake version >=3.5 or adjust the syntax in CMakeLists.txt.
CMake configuration error: Project specifies an outdated CMake minimum version. Update CMakeLists.txt to require CMake >=3.5 to resolve compatibility issues.
